revised_title: Obituary of John Lubbock, 1st Baron Avebury
tldr: This obituary honors John Lubbock, 1st Baron Avebury, a prominent figure in British science and politics. He contributed to various scientific societies and authored numerous books on topics like insects, plants, and coins. His work in establishing bank holidays and advocating for social reform left a lasting impact on British society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
